summary: Analyzed Metalogic/ structure revealing 6-subdirectory layered architecture with complete dependency graph. Documentation exists but needs consistency improvements and proper flowcharts. All 20 sorries are architectural (not blocking completeness). Recommended 4-phase implementation: leaf READMEs -> intermediate -> top-level -> code cleanup.

artifacts.summary: Comprehensive research report with dependency graph, sorry analysis, documentation assessment, structural improvements, and phased implementation plan
